name: Judah Maccabee
description: The Hammer. Led guerrilla revolt against Greek oppression. Rededicated the Temple. Hanukkah hero. Outsider who defeated the superpower.

hammer-raised.name: The Hammer
hammer-raised.description: War hammer raised, leading the charge
hammer-raised.prompt: warrior with hammer raised high - leading charge against impossible odds, the nickname made flesh, striking fear into empires

lighting-menorah.name: Lighting the Menorah
lighting-menorah.description: Rededicating the Temple, lighting the lamp
lighting-menorah.prompt: lighting the Temple menorah - miracle of oil about to begin, restoration of what was desecrated, sacred moment of rededication

guerrilla-commander.name: In the Hills
guerrilla-commander.prompt: crouched in mountain terrain planning attack - small band against empire, guerrilla tactics, the few against the many

victory-over-elephants.name: Against the War Elephants
victory-over-elephants.prompt: standing defiant as war elephants approach - facing the ancient tanks of warfare, courage that defied military logic, faith over fear

rallying-brothers.name: Rallying the Faithful
rallying-brothers.prompt: standing before brothers and followers - arm raised calling to fight, transforming farmers into warriors, the revolution begins

entering-temple.name: Reclaiming the Temple
entering-temple.description: First steps into the liberated Temple
entering-temple.prompt: entering desecrated Temple for first time - seeing the destruction, beginning the restoration, tears of grief and joy mixed
